CLUE: The - of Parma, novel by Stendhal
OUTPUT: ['It tells the story of an Italian named Fabrizio del Dongo, who becomes involved with politics and love amidst the turbulent backdrop of European revolutions.', 'Determined to reclaim his family estate, he embarks on an adventure in Milan where he becomes entangled with political factions and falls in love with Clelia Conti', "His relationships, including those with Countess Gina di Sanseverina and General Ernesto del Dongo (his father), further complicate the narrative, providing insight into human passions and societal conventions of Stendhal's time.", 'Its enduring appeal lies in its rich portrayal of human nature against the backdrop of political change.']
